mapper.select: select id,drugName,is_delete isDelete from t_drug where is_delete != 1

select t_drug.id, t_drug.drugName, t_drug.specifications, t_drug.unit, t_drug.drugNote, t_drug.is_delete isDelete, t_drug.fileurl from t_drug where t_drug.is_delete !=1
and t_drug.drugName like '%${drugName}%'
and t_drug.unit like '%${unit}%'
and drugNote like '%${drugNote}%'
and specifications like '%${specifications}%'
limit #{beginNo} , #{pageSize}

select count(*) from t_drug where is_delete !=1
and drugName like '$%{drugName}%'
and unit like '$%{unit}%'
and origin like '$%{origin}%'
and category_id like '%${categoryId}%'
select id,drugName,unit, specifications, drugNote,fileurl from t_drug where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update t_drug set drugName=#{drugName}, specifications=#{specifications}, unit=#{unit}, drugNote=#{drugNote}, fileurl=#{url} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(id) from t_drug where is_delete != 1

select id,drugName,specifications,unit,drugNote,fileurl from t_drug where 1=1 and is_delete = 0
limit #{start},#{limit}

select t_drug.id, t_drug.drugName, t_drug.referred, t_drug.specifications, t_drug.unit, t_drug.origin, t_drug.approvalNumber, t_drug.pleasedTo, t_drug.salesPrice, t_drug.inventory, t_drug.totalSales, t_drug.drugNote, t_drug_category.categoryName, t_drug.is_delete isDelete, t_drug.modified_user modifiedUser, t_drug.modified_time modifiedTime from t_drug , t_drug_category where t_drug.category_id=t_drug_category.categoryId and t_drug.is_delete !=1
and t_drug.drugName like '%${drugName}%'
